name: Violet Moon
description:
In this traditional 2D fighting game, forces of occult and the divine clash in a chain of intense duels. Sorcerers, knights, demons, and paladins enter the fray to carry out their mission at all costs. Choose your character and crush your foes with magic or might.

____________________________________________

Controls
Player 1
Movement - WASD
Light Attack - Q
Heavy Attack - E

Player 2
Movement - IJKL
Light Attack - U
Heavy Attack - O

____________________________________________

Artist: Jasmine S (@h0nkytonky)
